trans-unit.source: Implements ASP.NET template parsing for template files.
trans-unit.target: 实现 ASP.NET 模板分析模板文件。

trans-unit.source: The BaseTemplateParser class provides parser functionality for the <xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl> and <xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme> classes.
trans-unit.target: BaseTemplateParser 类提供了用于分析器功能<xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl>和<xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme>类。</xref:System.Web.UI.PageTheme> </xref:System.Web.UI.TemplateControl>

trans-unit.source: Because the BaseTemplateParser class is abstract, an instance of this class is not created directly.
trans-unit.target: 因为 BaseTemplateParser 类为抽象类，该类的实例不是直接创建。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.BaseTemplateParser"></xref> class.
Compiles and returns the type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.UserControl"></xref> control that is specified by the virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 编译并返回的一种<xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref>或<xref href="System.Web.UI.UserControl"></xref>控件指定的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter> object is defined and its <xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter.AllowVirtualReference%2A> property is `false`, the <xref:System.Web.UI.BaseTemplateParser.GetUserControlType%2A> method raises an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter>定义对象并将其<xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter.AllowVirtualReference%2A>属性是`false`、<xref:System.Web.UI.BaseTemplateParser.GetUserControlType%2A>方法引发<xref:System.Web.HttpException>异常。</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.BaseTemplateParser.GetUserControlType%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter.AllowVirtualReference%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.BaseTemplateParser.GetUserControlType%2A> method is a wrapper for the GetReferencedType method.
The virtual path of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Page"></xref> or <xref href="System.Web.UI.UserControl"></xref>.
The type of the page or user control.
The parser does not permit a virtual reference to the resource specified by virtualPath.
trans-unit.target: 分析器不允许对指定的资源的虚拟引用 virtualPath 。

trans-unit.source: Compiles and returns the type of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UserControl"></xref> object that is specified by the virtual path.
trans-unit.target: 编译并返回的一种<xref href="System.Web.UI.UserControl"></xref>对象指定的虚拟路径。

trans-unit.source: If a <xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter> object is defined and its <xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter.AllowVirtualReference%2A> property is `false`, the GetUserControlType method raises an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter>定义对象并将其<xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter.AllowVirtualReference%2A>属性是`false`，GetUserControlType 方法将引发<xref:System.Web.HttpException>异常。</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter.AllowVirtualReference%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.PageParserFilter>

trans-unit.source: Additionally, if the <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> object that is referenced by the virtual path is marked as a no-compile control, an <xref:System.Web.HttpException> exception will be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 此外，如果<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>引用的虚拟路径的对象标记为一个非编译<xref:System.Web.HttpException>将引发异常。</xref:System.Web.HttpException> </xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>

trans-unit.source: To force a <xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl> to be compiled, set the compilation mode attribute in its [@ Control](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5fd824c2-7d70-4f8a-ab47-0c7e0e43578b) directive to the <xref:System.Web.UI.CompilationMode> field.
trans-unit.target: 若要强制<xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>要编译，请将编译模式属性设置其[@ 控件](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/5fd824c2-7d70-4f8a-ab47-0c7e0e43578b)指令至<xref:System.Web.UI.CompilationMode>字段。</xref:System.Web.UI.CompilationMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.UserControl>

trans-unit.source: To set the compilation mode for pages and controls across an application, set the `compilationMode` attribute of the [pages Element (ASP.NET Settings Schema)](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4123bb66-3fe4-4d62-b70e-33758656b458) in the Web.config file.
trans-unit.target: 若要在应用程序设置页面和控件的编译模式，设置`compilationMode`属性[页元素 （ASP.NET 设置架构）](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/4123bb66-3fe4-4d62-b70e-33758656b458) Web.config 文件中。

trans-unit.source: The virtual path of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.UserControl"></xref>.
The type of the user control.
